title: Diamond Support Main Looking For A Serious Team
body:
IGN: IF Stronk

I am looking to compete in a serious/competitive environment with a dedicated bunch of people who want to strive for the best

replies.body: Well you can join the future team my friend and I are forming. We look to play in a very serious/competitive manner to the point where we wants complete analysis on all of our mistakes and good plays. If you're interested feel free to accept my request.
I will be on tomorrow morning at around 8
Well at the moment our ADC is currently leveling an unbanned account to 30, however I'm sure I can find a replacement.
